mapper.update: update chas_xt_yjlb set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YJLB = #{yjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yjsc = #{yjsc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cffs = #{cffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yjjb =#{yjjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yjfs =#{yjfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xsajyjsj =#{xsajyjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xzajyjsj =#{xzajyjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xstqyjsj =#{xstqyjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xztqyjsj =#{xztqyjsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YJLB,yjsc,cffs,yjjb,yjfs,xsajyjsj,xzajyjsj,xstqyjsj,xztqyjsj from chas_xt_yjlb
1=1 and isdel = 0
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and YJLB = '${yjlb}'
and BAQID in (select baqref.baqid from chas_xt_baqref baqref where baqref.sydwdm ='${sydwdm}')
